title: Why is champion select chat so inconsistent?
body:
In normal mode, when two people call a role, they see themselves as saying it first, then half of the players claim the first got it, then the other half say the second got it (and usually one guy is just unsure, doesn't care, or joined late)

A huge amount of toxicity comes from this, when two guys avoid helping each other in jealousy of the missed role, when they were sure they got it first.


It happens way too often to simply be a "This guy got it first (but I'm lying cus I'm in a premade with him >:D)"

Maybe add a role maker, where you type in a word (mid, top, ADC, supp, bot, jg, second supp, second top, etc. don't make it a button select, as it discourages the meta from changing, or fun troll-comps which actually work.), and press enter, then it says the exact millisecond or second it was posted.

replies.body: I actually came to the boards to say this. As HeartVine outlines, the system is just so stupid. I do try Teambuilder every now to avoid these problems but I always stop searching because it takes way to long than a normal blind pick. First world LoL problems {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
That's why you need someone else to tell you who got it and be honest, because the chat is client side and not server side.

It's not inconsistent it's just a crummy set up, it's dependent on the ping of the person using it. For example: Person A has 50 ping, person B has 500 ping. If they both enter a message at the same time it will take 550ms for it to appear completely on person A's computer but 1000ms for it to appear completely on person B's computer. Depending on when each person hits enter and what their ping is, it can make it seem like they each got in first on their end.

Uh, that's what I mean by inconsistent, it's not the same by all the players.

It's nice to finally know why, however
Blind pick summoner's rift. Where you yell "TOPPPPPPP" at the top of your lungs, then spam it 10 more times to make sure everyone gets the message.
Why not use TeamBuilder if you only want one role.

Looks like a bit of good news, as of patch 5.13 there's been some chat related bug fixes :

> * Rapid-fire chat messages now **always** appear in the same order for everyone in a lobby or chat room
* Decreased chat message latency. This isn't really a bug but it's related to our last point!

Source: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-513-notes#patch-bugfixes
